channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Badly damaged abandoned vehicle, 5th October
item.description:
This van has been here for months and in very bad condition. I also believe that people may be sleeping in it as at night I see people in the van.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead High Street, Plumstead, London

item.title: Illegal Waste Dumping by Food Trucks, 5th October
item.description:
I’m reporting repeated incidents of illegal commercial waste dumping by food trucks operating at 103 Union Street, London SE1 0LA. They have been regularly discarding meat waste, used oil cans, and other rubbish into the residential bins outside my property at [Your Full Address]. This has caused overflowing bins, strong smells, and hygiene issues. As per the Environmental Protection Act 1990, commercial waste must not be disposed of in domestic bins, and this activity amounts to fly-tipping. Please investigate and take appropriate enforcement action. I can provide dates, descriptions, vidoe, and photos if needed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Southwark Bridge Road, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox that is rotten, 5th October
item.description:
Walking through Constitution Hill today, in the green next to the walking and next to a tree (on the left hand side form Buckingham Palace to Hyde Park) my daughter saw a rotten dead fox (stinky). I didn’t take a picture as it was too disgusting).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grosvenor Place, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped in communal car park., 5th October
item.description:
It have been there and not moved for months, I need to get access to my gas meter between the bushes at the front of the car. I posted a note on the car asking politely if it could just be pulled back a bit so I can get access and my note was removed but the car was not, i dont know who it belongs to so i cant ask in person. Ive recived a email stating I need to urgently send a gas meter reading but due to my ill health I can't climbe over drains etc so the only way I access the meter is where the car is, there is usually a post there to stop the cars going so far in but it's been broken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willowfields Close, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Health and safety issue, 5th October
item.description:
I have messaged a few time and asked for the barriers to be picked up, we have a lots of young children and elderly residents living in the close and I am worried that there will be an accident soon… The barriers are very heavy and if they fell on a child they would really hurt them. Please please can they be picked up

item.title: Fridge Freezer dumped on pavement, 5th October
item.description:
This big fridge freezer has been dumped on the pavement & has been sitting here for around a week now . This has caused problems when it has got busy with people trying to get past in both directions.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Silver Spring Close, Northumberland Heath, London
